title: Bagels and Beans
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain of lunchrooms, this one is situated in a monumental two-storey Jugendstil building in the central shopping district. Menu is inspired not by American-style bagels but the tastes and herbs of Europe and Southern France. Offers a choice of vegetarian and vegan bagles, sweets, coffees and fresh juices - made largely with fair-trade and organic ingredients. Free Wi-Fi.
